name: Defender of the Relics
description:
Intruders have infiltrated the lost city of Atlantis with the intent of claiming all of its relics. As the sole surviving Guardian, you have to stop them before they strip your home bare.

Traverse the randomly generated labyrinth from a top-down view, and take down the thieves from behind. How high of a score can you get before they overwhelm you?

Controls:

Keyboard
- WASD to move
- Esc for pause menu

Controller
- Joystick to move

Use mouse in menu

Credits:

Programmers:

  • Eddie Norberg
  • Joakim Stenmark
  • Louise Buller
  • Nicklas Hidesjö
  • Robin Bono

Artists:

  • Theresa Andersson
  • Trang Nguyen
  • Moa Hansen

Sound and Music:

  • Joakim Stenmark

This game was created in 4 days for the Global Game Jam 2021.
